item.title: PaaS not just about runtime, data services are the next differentiator
item.description: In general, Platform as a Service (PaaS) is developed by developers for developers. Of course they’re going to love it. It enables them to focus on the nuances of their applications — not on the day-to-day pointless activities that so often take their time away from solving real problems.
